text: The Last Road () is a 1986 Soviet drama movie directed by Leonid Menaker and starring Aleksandr Kalyagin, Vadim Medvedev, Irina Kupchenko, Yelena Karadzhova, Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy. == Other websites == * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Menaker
title: The Last Road
